decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of the original permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:

"	PLC001 Rev. A.
"	PLC002 Rev. B.
"	PLC008.
"	JB Citideck: Technical Specification - Timber Decking.
"	All about bricks - Grey Stock.
"	All about bricks - Buff Stock.
"	Dales Std Coping to Masonry.
"	F30 780 Dales Standard Meridian Coping System.
"	Aluprof - Window and door system MB-70.
"	Balcony Systems - Sophisticated Glass Railings.
"	Equitone [natura], Equitone [picture] (N163 Soft Grey and N211 Classic Grey).

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am to 6:00pm Mondays to Friday, 8:00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays, with no work to take place on Sundays and Bank Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The refuse storage and recycling arrangements shown on the approved drawings shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
Condition : 6 - No dwelling shall be occupied until space has been laid out within the site in accordance with drawing number PL025 Rev. A for 21 cars to be parked.

Condition : 7 - he development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:

"	PLC003.
"	PLC004.
"	PLC005.
"	British Standard Flag - Data Sheet.

Condition : 8 - In this condition "retained tree" means an existing tree which is to be retained in accordance with the approved plans and particulars; and paragraphs (a) and (b) below shall have effect until the expiration of 5 years from (the date of the occupation of the building for its permitted use).

(a) No retained tree shall be cut down, uprooted or
destroyed, nor shall any retained tree be topped or lopped other than in accordance with the approved plans and particulars, without the written approval of the local planning authority. Any topping or lopping approved shall be carried out in accordance with British Standard [3998 (Tree Work)] or any other BS replacing.

(b) If any retained tree is removed, uprooted or destroyed or dies, another tree shall be planted at the same place and that tree shall be of such size and species, and shall be planted at such time, as may be specified in writing by the local planning authority.

(c) The erection of fencing for the protection of any
retained tree shall be undertaken in accordance with the
approved plans and particulars before any equipment, machinery or materials are brought on to the site for the purposes of the development, and shall be maintained until all equipment, machinery and surplus materials have been removed from the site. Nothing shall be stored or placed in any area fenced in accordance with this condition and the ground levels within those areas shall not be altered, nor shall any excavation be made, without the written consent of the local planning authority.

Condition : 9 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:
	
"	Desk Study & Stage 1 Risk Assessment December 2014.
"	Ground Investigation October 2014
"	Letter from MRH Geotechnical re: Details of samples.
"	Concept Life Sciences - Certificate of Analysis dated 15-Aug-2017.

Condition : 10 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:
	
"	Two-Tier Bike Rack - Specification Sheet;
"	Sheffield Cycle Stand - Specification Sheet; and
"	PLC006 Rev. A.

Condition : 11 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:

"	Car Park Management Plan May 2017.
"	Classgrade Ltd Sub Contractor Order Form dated 4th November 2015.

Condition : 12 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:
	
"	Delivery and Servicing Plan December 2015.
"	SK13-A.

Condition : 13 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:
	
"	PLC007.
"	Site Logistic Plan.
"	Delivery and Servicing Plan.

Condition : 14 - The building shall not be occupied until a means of vehicular access has been constructed in accordance with the approved plans and the existing access to the site is closed and reinstated so that it cannot be used as an access across the pavement.

Condition : 15 - The development shall not be occupied until the loading bay on Hampton Road West shown on drawing SK13-A is provided. The approved loading bay shall thereafter be retained solely for its designated use.

Condition : 16 - The on-site delivery area shall be marked out and only used for deliveries and no other purpose. The approved delivery area shall thereafter be retained solely for its designated use.

Condition : 17 - The development hereby permitted shall be designed and constructed in accordance with the Lifetime Home standards as set out in the London Plan and Accessible London Supplementary Planning Guidance.

Condition : 18 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the approved Energy Statement (Element Sustainability, June 2018) and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 19 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:

"	Part G Water Calculations - Apartment Type
"	WAT 1 - Calculator Code for Sustainable Homes 08/10/2015
"	Eurowa Brochure - Eurowa bathtubs made of steel enamel.
"	Stroma Certification - WAT 1 Calculator, Code for Sustainable Homes

Condition : 20 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the following details:
	
"	6008/1005 Rev. P0.
"	6008/1010 Rev. P0.
"	6008/1015 Rev. P0.
"	6008/1016 Rev. P0.
"	6008/1001 Rev. C1.
"	Drainage Maintenance Document February 2016.
"	Gradation Analysis Test Report dated Mon 27 March 2017
"	6008/1001 Rev. C6

Condition : 21 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with following details:

"	PLC006 Rev. A.

Condition : 22 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the approved details submitted as part of application ref: 00550/N/P3(11,22ii) and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Condition : 23 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the approved Environmental Noise Assessment and the following details:

"	Air Permeability Test Certificates
"	Aerquality Statement dated 25 April 2017
"	Sound Insulation Testing dated September 2017
"	Velfac Windows Brochure dated January 2018
"	Vision Glazing and Spandrel Panels Details

Condition : 24 - Any windows installed in the front and side elevations shall be hermetically sealed glazing to ensure full compliance with the requirements set out in BS 8223:1999 'Sound Insulation and Noise Reduction for Buildings - Code of Practice'.
description: Variation of Condition 3(approved plans and proposals) Condition 18(energy strategy) of planning permission 00550/N/P3 dated 19/11/2015 for The demolition of existing library and erection of a part five, part four and part three storey building to provide 35 new self contained residential units with associated parking and amenity facilities.
